1. (6, 0) - far down and left
2. (8, 7) - close, down and right
3. (2, 9) - left on same row
4. (1, 0) - far down and left

- UP: Would hit wall, not possible
- DOWN: Safe move towards (8, 7) apple
- LEFT: Safe move towards (2, 9) or (1, 9) apples
- RIGHT: Safe move towards nothing particular

The closest apple is (8, 7), but moving left towards the two apples at (2, 9) and (1, 9) seems more efficient as I can potentially get two apples in quick succession.
